name: HBA Partners Public Affairs
goal:
Our team develops and executes strategies to help our clients engage with policy makers and public sector decision makers.​

Government relations
​
Informing and influencing the policy-making process is our core competency. We know how to expand political reach and utilise the full range of advocacy and parliamentary tools to realise our clients’ objectives

Strategy development

As an integrated agency with consultants drawn from across the field of politics and communications, HBA can help you shape, deliver and measure your engagement with key influencers and decision makers.

Stakeholder management

Mapping stakeholders is stage one. We identify friends and foes and their scope to impact on your business success. Government and the administration are the starting point, but we always go further.

Strategic communication
​
We can help you design communication strategies, key-messages and actions both off-line and on-line to raise awareness and provide your brand and stake-holders relations with prestige and added value in your target markets.

Digital advocacy

Our digital and design team is truly integrated across the business which means that we can quickly convert public affairs challenges into compelling messages which achieve measurable results.

Event management​
​
HBA Partners has been working with numerous associations to set up and organise large scale events which include conferences, conventions and trade shows. Our team can assist you in developing a business case for your event and delivering services that exceed your expectations.
interests: Audiovisual and Media, Communication, Competition, Employment and Social Affairs, Energy, Enterprise, Environment, General and Institutional Affairs, Research and Technology, Sport, Trade
